EmailTemplate.description: Automated Message that goes to Case Owner when a new email comes in on their case - **do not edit unique name**
EmailTemplate.name: Email to Case Owner about new Mail
EmailTemplate.subject: New case email notification. Case number {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An email has been received for case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!subjectString}.
Please click the link below to review the new email and respond appropriately.
https://tecentral--FullPIC.cs11.my.salesforce.com/{!Case.Id}
NOTE: It is not recommended that you forward this email because its association with the original case may be lost.
